name: Sky Island
description:
This is a little game made for the Timdred game jam. In two days This is a game where every tile you step on falls after you move off, and there is a variety of tiles that have different properties.

If you are wondering why this game is unpolished or potentially buggy, it's because I did not have a lot of experience or time to make this.

I hope you like this game! (It's also my first)

 controls:

WASD or arrow keys
